def click_wechat_buttons():
    # 
    hwnd = win32gui.FindWindow(None, "")
    if hwnd == 0:
        print("")
        return False
    # 
    left, top, right, bottom = win32gui.GetWindowRect(hwnd)
    width = right - left
    height = bottom - top

peekOfCode:
def save_avatar():
    """ avatar.md """
    data = request.json
    print(':', data)  # 
    defalut_avatar_name = config.behavior.context.avatar_dir.split('/')[-1]  # 
    avatar_name = data.get('avatar', defalut_avatar_name)  # 
    avatar_path = os.path.join(
        os.path.dirname(config.behavior.context.avatar_dir),
        avatar_name, 
        'avatar.md'
